summary: The client discussed challenges testing SP-001 on their Mac and inquired about replicating it in SP-002; Mike analyzed the backlog, identified setup gaps, and proposed SP-002 with re-pulled core stories plus Mac-compatible setup for local testing.

actions.task: Review and approve or adjust the proposed SP-002 stories
Save the sprint, update statuses, and initiate execution upon approval

risks.risk: Persistent Mac testing issues like port conflicts or environment setup failures
risks.mitigation: Incorporate US-016 script with Mac-specific checks (arm64 compat, firewall notes) and NFR-001 for HTTP-only mode
